[[PEGI]]: 7+
[http://www.elspa.com/ ELSPA]:3+ | platforms = [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]], [[Super Nintendo Entertainment System|Super NES]], [[Sega Mega Drive]], [[Sega Game Gear]], [[Game Boy]], [[Game Boy Color|GBC]] | media = | requirements = | input = }} '''''Tintin in Tibet''''' is a [[video game]] loosely based on the ''[[Tintin in Tibet]]'' comic book written and drawn by [[HergÃ©]]. It was released for [[Personal computer|PC]] ([[MS-DOS]] and [[Windows 95]]), [[Super Nintendo Entertainment System|Super NES]], [[Game Boy]], [[Game Boy Color]] and the [[Sega Mega Drive]] by the late 1995. ==Release dates== * ''Tintin in Tibet'' for [[Game Boy Color]] - [[2001]] * ''Tintin in Tibet'' for [[Personal computer|PC]] - [[1996]] * ''Tintin in Tibet'' for [[Super Nintendo Entertainment System|Super NES]] - [[December 1995#December|December 1995]] * ''Tintin in Tibet'' for [[Sega Mega Drive]] - [[1995]] * ''Tintin in Tibet'' for [[Sega Game Gear]] - [[1995]] * ''Tintin in Tibet'' for [[Game Boy]] - [[1995]] * ''Tintin in Tibet'' for [[Game Gear]] - [[1990s]] ==External links== * [http://www.tintinologist.org/ The Cult of Tintin at Tintinologist.org] * [http://www.mobygames.com/search/quick?quickSearch=Tintin+in+Tibet Tintin in Tibet at Moby Games] * [http://www.gamefabrique.com/tintin-au-tibet.html Tintin in Tibet] at Gamefabrique {{Adventure-videogame-stub}} {{Tintin and HergÃ©}} [[Category:1995 video games]] [[Category:Game Boy games]] [[Category:Sega Master System games]] [[Category:Sega Mega Drive games]] [[Category:Super Nintendo Entertainment System games]] [[Category:Tintin games]] [[Category:Video games developed in Spain]] [[Category:Windows games]] [[fr:Tintin au Tibet (jeu vidÃ©o)]] [[id:Tintin in Tibet]]
